programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business by inviting an evil presence into their home, not realizing how dangerous it is.

programme.title: Supergirl S3 - EP 16
programme.desc: The third Worldkiller, Pestilence, begins striking down the citizens of National City.... including Winn and Alex. Supergirl and Imra disagree on how to deal with Pestilence, and Lena continues trying to find a cure for Sam.

programme.title: Supergirl S3 - EP 17
programme.desc: Supergirl discovers that she has a mental link to Sam and Julia, and takes Lena and Alex with her to rescue them. Meanwhile, James faces a tough decision when he must decide whether to investigate Lena or not after she kept Reign's existence a secret.

programme.title: Frozen Planet - EP 4
programme.desc: Focuses on life and the environment in both the Arctic and Antarctic.

programme.title: Chaos Caught On Camera - EP 5
programme.desc: Caught On Camera unlocks the stories behind some of the most compelling, shocking, remarkable and epic footage ever captured by people in the middle of these real-life disaster movies.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 127
programme.desc: What happens in people's brains as death nears; what they may see or hear; whether last words reveal something about the other side; an initiative grief counselor; how to spot fake reviews on the internet.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Mat Yoyo - The New Generation is an educational program in its third season and continues to provide children with wholesome family edu-tainment and fun.

programme.title: Bugsville - EP 8
programme.desc: Bugsville is an entertaining and educational pre-school programme featuring NATALIE, her parents (Mary and Fred) and her friends. The show will feature live action filmed in home sets as well as composited CGI shot in a green screen studio.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 30
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Babar And The Adventures Of Badou - EP 63
programme.desc: Adventure in Celestville! From Pirate Adventures to The Rescuteers, Badou is our fearless leader and we see him in action as the head of the rescue club and he visits his friend Chiku in Monkeyville. Every episode is a true adventure as Babar, Badou, and all his friends explore the exciting world of Celestville.

programme.title: Sesame Street S46 - EP 32
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Sesame Street S46 - EP 33
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: TOBOT: Galaxy Detectives - EP 21
programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 45
programme.desc: Continuing adventures of Arashi in his quest to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner.

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 35
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 32
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 15
programme.desc: The Turtles face Shredder's new deadly assassin and uncover a new Kraang plot. They'll also encounter more mutants, discover more about the mysterious Kraang species, and venture into new realms.

programme.title: Abraureka S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: In this episode of Abraureka! Kyle and Cheryl explore the magic of forces. In their workshop, they make a water sprinkler with straws and Science. In the street science segment, they challenge passer-bys to lift a ping pong ball with nothing but a glass. Watch our little science magician Daniel, make a whistling balloon, while Cheryl and Kyle surprise Princess Elizabeth Primary school students and show them how with magic, they can make a paper clip float on water.

programme.title: Jeff Wayne's Musical Version Of The War Of The Worlds-The New Generation: Alive On Stage
programme.desc: Recorded in London's Wembley Stadium, The War of the Worlds Live is a spectacular mix of live music, theatre, multi-media and visual arts on a grand scale. It combines the brillance of the original performers including Jeff Wayne, Justin Hayward, Chris Thompson and even the late Richard Burton with a brand new cast, full orchestra, and an unforgettable fully operated 30 foot Martian fighting machine.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 633
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Odd Squad S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Odd Squad is a high-tech agency run by kids equipped with the world's most advanced and unpredictable gadgetry. The agents investigate weird and unusual phenomena around them and use math to put things right.

programme.title: Pound Puppies S3 - EP 20
programme.desc: The mission of a team of fearless dogs is to find homes for puppies in need. Their motto is A pup for every person and a person for every pup.

programme.title: Bat Pat - EP 0051 & 0052
programme.desc: Bat Pat and his human friends seek to unravel the mysteries of the scary creatures that lurk about in Fogville, always discovering that the supernatural characters aren't evil - just loveable and misunderstood! Based on the best-selling book franchise.

programme.title: Horrid Henry S4 - EP 0039 & 0040
programme.desc: For Horrid Henry, life is just not fair! He feels that the rest of the world is against him and he wages a constant war against the tyranny of adults. Like any headstrong young boy, he is determined, relentless, he doesn't hold back and he never admits defeat!

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 16
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Exlosers S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: It's Janice's birthday! Leonard gate crashes, and Clandestino realises he has another rival to deal with it besides Justin. Greg has a big fight with Annie, Janice's mom. Madem Siti may have found a cure, but still needs more tests, and Daryl is getting impatient. Gross wants Miss Priya to give him his old job back which she refuses. Gross is desperate enough to call someone from his past for help.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 8
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - EP 1
programme.desc: Alaska: A Year in the Wild - Winter in Alaska, the animals must battle to survive. Those creatures that face it head-on must show ingenuity and resilience if theyre to see the spring shoots reappear. For the next seven months, they must battle each other and the elements just to stay alive.

programme.title: Everything, Everything
programme.desc: A 17 year old girl named Madeline Whittier has a rare disease that causes her to have to stay indoors 24-7 with her filtered air. Her whole life is books, her mom, and her nurse. One day, a moving truck pulls in next door. There she sees Olly. Olly Bright is Maddy's new neighbor. They get to know each other through emails. The more they get to know each other, the more they fall in love. Olly starts to make Maddy realize that she isn't really living. This starts the adventures of her new life.

(PG)(重)(第27集上)沈沝在许旺股东会上当众斥责黄家有问题，还播放梁赞贬许家的录音，使许家更决意分拆。丽荧偕永正亲自见沈沝当面对质，沈沝指出永正曾与她郊游兼在月老庙前订誓盟。.

programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 11

The principal informs Hui Yan that the school is making an exception by providing her with a scholarship to continue her studies. Hui Yan is grateful but uneasy because she had already promised Qing Hao and decides to continue to help him cheat. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)庆豪戴着眼镜入场考试，慧妍在场外正要为他提供答案，却被叫去校长办公室。校长通知她学校决定破例发特别奖学金给她，帮助她继续升学。慧妍既感激又不安，因为已经答应了庆豪，还是决定帮他作弊。不料庆豪离开考场时，被讲师发现他有两副一模一样的眼镜！.

Yu Wen argues back, causing the two to end up in bad terms. (PG)子乐在张家病情发作，令浩翔不悦。子乐走后，雨汶向浩翔说出子乐有病的事，浩翔更加反对她和子乐交往，担心子乐的病会遗传，影响下一代。雨汶据理力争，与父亲不欢而散。.

(PG13-部分画面令人不安)古新司和妻子余蓉在家招待黄成和涂凌。余蓉在凌晨时分怀疑自己被侵犯了。古新司立刻报警。徐朗测试古新司，发现他喜欢较暴露，身材较好的女人，却选择保守的余蓉做妻子，于是觉得古新司很可疑。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 29
programme.desc: On their way to to Lan Ling, Wei Wuxian and Wen Ning were ambushed by Jin Zixun. Jin Zixuan came to make peace but was wrongly killed by Wen Ning. Wen Qing led her men to face the music. (PG-些许暴力画面)魏无羡和温宁前往兰陵的路，竟然被金子勋带人团团包围。金子轩过来劝阻却被温宁错杀。 温情率温氏的人去请罪。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

Her menu includes Salmon Sashimi, but in South American Way, and Spaghetti Alla Giapponese which is a squid dish. Sounds interesting? Let's find out more in "Home Dining"! (重)杨雪琳在英国工作时，周末有空常会给当地的家厨义务帮忙，从而接触到别具特色的“南美日系料理"，并深深被吸引。她回来后，当上家厨，也把这些令人回味再三的美味介绍给大家。今天她精心为嘉宾准备的“南美日系料理"，就包括了外型像飞碟的鸡肉奶酪酥饼、做法特殊的南美式刺身、肉酱墨鱼面和柚子鲈鱼饭。想对这些料理有多一些认识吗？欢迎你一起来“开门见餐"！.

The principal gives Qing Hao three days to name his accomplice or face expulsion from school. (PG)(重)庆豪作弊被发现，及时将眼镜冲入马桶，毁尸灭迹。讲师向校长报告怀疑庆豪作弊，还销毁证据，庆豪极力狡辩。不料眼镜塞住了马桶，被校工捞了上来，令他无从抵赖。校长限他三天内供出同谋，否则就要将他开除。.

programme.desc: A dance studio at Tiong Bahru offers dance and workout classes for elderly enthusiasts. An ang-ku-kueh granny, a patient of Alzheimer and a veteran squash player find delight in moving to the rhythm. They also regain confidence and build new friendship here. 中巴鲁的一所舞蹈学校，每周常有不同背景的老年人来跳社交舞或健身操，当中有制作红龟粿的新潮祖母、患上阿尔兹海默症的八旬老太太以及不能再作剧烈运动的壁球高手。跳舞让他们活络筋骨，增强记忆，更交上新朋友，重拾健康与自信。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 18
programme.desc: Wei Jun brings Summer, an influencer to the grand opening of Zi Le's shop to do a livestream of Zi Le baking. Although Zi Le was nervous, he managed to complete his task. Bi Qiu offers Wei Jun and Summer some pastries. However, Summer discovered a thread of metal in the pastry! (PG)子乐的店终于开张，伟君带了网红Summer来做直播，要直播子乐做饼的过程，子乐虽然紧张，幸好最终完成任务。碧秋拿了一些饼干给伟君，让他给Summer试吃，不料Summer突然惊叫起来，原来饼干中竟有铁丝！.

programme.title: A Taste of Festival - EP 7

Chef Enoch demonstrates two Valentine's Day dishes made with sea bass. 情人节，一个甜蜜与浪漫的日子。主持人不只找来专家和厨师分享东方情人节，也就是七夕节的饮食风俗之外，还请来甜品师教导西方情人节送礼佳品巧克力的做法。厨师张正义也会示范两道以金目鲈为主食材的情人节佳肴！.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 19

As they continue to venture deeper into the world of confusing Mandarin terms and bombastic English words, how will these two fare? (重)《好好说 慢慢讲》这集恩来要到美发院学习和头发、发型甚至头部穴位等有关的华语词汇，而怡伶则会到裁缝店学习和量身、布料、身形等等相关的英语词汇。恩来必须用华语和不同的顾客讨论发型，而怡伶也必须用英语和顾客沟通他们要怎么修改衣服，这两个活宝在这过程又会闹出哪些笑话呢？.

(PG)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 73
programme.desc: Ya Zhou invites Da Ming, Zhi Gao, along with some other friends to his office. He introduces an investment plan to them. However, everyone is wary about placing their hard-earned money into this investment. Ya Zhou suggests having the respectable Da Ming to be the leader of this investment plan. 亚洲请了达明、志高以及一些街坊到他公司，介绍万无一失的投资计划。他能言善道，大家听得心动，但对于要把血汗钱交由亚洲投资，始终抱有疑虑。亚洲知道大家心态，提议由"德高望重"的达明当个带头人，达明却不敢答应。.

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 5
programme.desc: The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. 美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 奶爸百分百 Nanny Daddy - EP 18
programme.desc: A story about daddies who are also nannies.

programme.title: 我爱黄金屋 Four Walls And A Ceiling - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) The dream of the freehold chamber continues. In Singapore, at least. And what better way to wake up and smell the bank loans than by walking in the shoes of property agent Terence Cao, who knows all about that. (重).

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 326
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 14
programme.desc: Qing Hao professes his love to Hui Yan; Cheng Guang and Jia Qi eavesdrop on their conversation. Hui Yan rejects Qing Hao saying that she is currently not ready for a relationship and just wants to focus on completing her studies, she hopes they can still be friends. Qing Hao is very disappointed, Cheng Guang on the other hand, is rather surprised. Jia Qi encourages Cheng Guang to find a chance to tell Hui Yan how he feels but he can't find the courage to do so. 庆豪向慧妍告白，成光和嘉琪躲在一边偷听。慧妍拒绝了庆豪，表示自己现阶段不想谈恋爱，只想好好完成学业，希望和庆豪还是可以当朋友。庆豪失望不已，成光则有些意外。嘉琪鼓励成光也找机会向慧妍告白，但成光鼓不起勇气。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 98
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 29
programme.desc: (29A) At the Xu Group re-opening party, Yadun receives the guests as if he is the host. Xiuhui is worried that Yadun will become overly-ambitious. She also hopes that Bei Er will keep a distance from Weijia.(29B) Yongzheng tells Yalin that they can still be good friends after the demerger. Yi Ai starts to go to the countryside to take photographs more frequently. A tea store owner cum local guide, Song Youji, begins to develop a liking towards her. (29A)在许绰行重新开业的酒会上，雅顿俨如主人。秀慧担心雅顿野心过大，又寄语贝儿趁机远离围家。(29B)永正与雅麟私下谈心事，表明仍然可做好朋友。以爱最近常到元朗郊外拍生态照。茶档老板宋友基为生态导赏人员，这几个月不时都会碰见以爱，更对她产生好感。.

programme.title: 新语研究所 2 Fun With SINGnese S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Fun with SINGnese 2 continues to explore the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses how the terms Kopi, Catch-no-ball and Kreta Ayer came about, and why Malaysia is also known as Lian Bang or Zhou Fu. 《新语研究所 2》和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么马来西亚也称作联邦和州府？为什么不明白也说成抓不到球？牛车水的名字是怎么来的？ 为什么在早年咖啡写成㗝呸？.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 20
programme.desc: Summer uploads a picture of her mouth inflammation online, gaining support from netizens who start to condemn Happy Prince. Bi Qiu feels that Happy Prince is Zi Le's blood, sweat and tears and she must find a way to save it. Da Wei expresses that the only thing that can save Happy Prince is money, but Zi Le has been cheated out of all his money. Summer把自己嘴巴发炎的照片放上网，获得网民的支持，纷纷谴责Happy Prince。碧秋认为Happy Prince是子乐的心血，一定要想办法补救。达威表示现在只有一样东西可以救Happy Prince，那就是钱，可惜子乐的钱已被人骗光……。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 32
programme.desc: Wei Wuxian saw the bad tempered Jinling, Yanli's son and Jiang Cheng. When Jiang Cheng saw Wei Wuxian, he instantly doubted his identity. 十六年之后魏无羡遇见了脾气大戾气重的金凌也就是江厌离的儿子和江澄了。江澄一见他就怀疑他的身份。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 5
programme.desc: Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 仁心侠旅 II The Activist's Journey S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: In the second series of The Activist's Journey, the host (Paige Chua) travels to places in Asia, where social issues and inequality breed. This series will focus on the long-standing problems that have been faced in Asia, such as shortage of food and drinking water, lack of basic medical care and the extreme marginalisation of weaker groups in society (women, children, special patients, and the poor). (重)第二系列的"仁心侠旅"，主持人前往亚洲各地去关注更多不平不公的社会现象。本系列将眼光锁定在亚洲长期存在的几个棘手问题-粮食和食水不足，基本医疗缺乏，以及弱势群体的极端边缘化。.

programme.title: 欢喜没烦恼 Happy-Go-Lucky - EP 4
programme.desc: The Happy folks continue to talk about active ageing. To age actively, lifelong learning is a must! This episode also sees Hong Kong veteran actress Mimi Chu who finds her way to Rock Grandma Mary Ho. Known for her appearance in one of China's most popular TV variety shows and Singapore's NDP 2017, Grandma Mary surprises you with her love for the electric guitar. 欢喜街的街坊继续谈论活跃乐龄的课题。要老得活跃，就一定要终身学习！这一集节目也请来香港资深艺人朱咪咪来追踪摇滚阿嬷何月英。何奶奶不仅出现在中国一个火红综艺节目，也曾在我国2017年的国庆庆典上亮相。看她弹起电吉他，肯定让你跌破眼镜！.

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 74
programme.desc: Jie Jie offers her own money to Da Gong as investment. Bemused, Da Gong questions if she is not worried that he would cheat her of her money. 洁洁愿意把钱交由大功代为投资，大功笑问她难道不担心被他所骗吗？洁洁说人与人之间应该互相信任。依依叫亚洲不要骗那些小市民的钱，亚洲说自己要赚的是大钱，不是干些招摇撞骗的事。.

programme.title: 新成龙历险记2 All New Jackie Chan Adventures S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Professor Chaos is a villain who creates capsule monsters out of children's bad habits and uses them to turn dreams into nightmares. The brave, smart and kind guardians of J-Team, Jackie, Amy and Duangduang, must stand up against Professor Chaos and his evil plan by stopping all his evil creations and protect children from the nightmares! 乱来教授是一名恶棍，他根据孩子的坏习惯制造胶囊怪物，用它们将梦想变成噩梦。 J-Team的杰克 ,小美和铛铛是勇敢，聪明和善良的梦境守护者。他们阻止乱来教授的邪恶创作并保护孩子免受噩梦，对抗乱来教授和他的邪恶计划！.

programme.desc: Cheng Guang plucks up courage to profess to Hui Yan, this puts her at a loss. Hui Yan sees that Cheng Guang lacks self-confidence and can't bear to hurt him, she doesn't reject him but just says that she needs some time to consider. This reaction makes Cheng Guang think that Hui Yan has accepted him and he begins to treat her as his girlfriend; Hui Yan feels pressured. 成光鼓起勇气向慧妍告白，慧妍有点不知所措。她见到成光没有自信的样子，心有不忍，担心伤害他，没有直接拒绝，婉转地说自己需要时间考虑。没想到却让成光以为慧妍接受了他，从此以后把她当女友，令慧妍倍感压力。.

programme.title: Body SOS Sr 8 - EP 30
programme.desc: In Singapore, breast cancer is the top cancer killer of women! It was estimated that 1 in 14 women will develop the condition before the age of 75! What the factors that will increase risk of having breast cancer? Is food or diet linked to breast cancer? What are the treatment options? 乳癌是本地女性头号杀手！每14名女性中就有1位会在75岁前患乳癌！到底哪些因素会提高罹患风险？和饮食是否有关联？中西医有哪些治疗选项？.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 44
programme.desc: Frontline is a weekly investigative current affairs programme that aims to address issues closest to the hearts of Singaporeans. 民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 伺机 The Driver - EP 1
programme.desc: In the eerie darkness, the cries of a little girl pierce through the silence. Kenichi jolts awake, drenched in sweat. It's a nightmare, the same recurring one. Kenichi heads to the balcony to catch the breaking sunrise. He's grateful for it, grateful for a new day. Kenichi is a man of few words, and even fewer friends. He lives in an unfurnished room, save for a simple sofa and a bed. In this dull apartment, what stands out is a single, blue-white rose. 深夜,刀光剑影,鬼哭神嚎,小女孩的哭泣声。建一又被噩梦惊醒了，每次醒来，他总是大汗淋漓。建一喜欢阳光，每一天的早晨，他总会起身看日出，仿佛珍惜每一天。他很少说话，没什么朋友，家中的家具也不多，只有简单的沙发和床。家中唯一带有生命的反倒是他阳台上的那朵蓝白玫瑰花。建一对这朵玫瑰花的悉心照料，仿佛这朵蓝白玫瑰就是他生命的全部。.

programme.desc: (14),,. ,,,, 一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸, 因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生… 这一群不同囯藉的小朋友,一开始就亙相抗拒,歧视和排彻,更甚至結党紛爭,直到有一次佩娸见识到他们思家的心情,离鄉的孤独,才身感其受,领悟到自己是多么的活在福中不知福,从那一刻起佩娸主动的伸出友誼之手,大家坦开心房,透过彼此的关心,扶持和学习,建立起不分囯界的真挚友情….

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 8
programme.desc: The Old Lady's Potato Soup restaurant case has severely damaged Dahe Group's corporate image. Michael gets reprimanded by his father, Chairman Zheng. Michael bears a grudge against Dehao for this. He captures Dehao and attempts to kill him. Dehao's daughter, Xiubin, suddenly visits Dehao after three long years. Dehao is surprised and feels odd... 因老婆婆马铃薯汤店的事已经严重破坏了大和集团的企业形象，麦可被父亲郑会长责骂了一顿。麦可因此对德浩含恨在心，捉走德浩并企图杀死他。时隔三年不见的女儿秀彬突然偷偷跑去德浩的事务所看他，让他又惊又奇。。。。。。.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 2
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 7
programme.desc: Xu Ren cannot get back to his time and has to find ways to survive in Seoul. He first lodges at Yanjing's grandfather's home. After that, he sends in a job application to the Xinhui Korean Medicine Hospital and asks the director directly whether he can work there. 许任一直无法回到他的朝代，只好找方法在首尔生活。 他先去寄住在妍京爷爷的家， 然后向新惠韩方医院提交申请就职, 直接询问医院的院长可否让他在那里工作。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 8
programme.desc: Yanjing's grandfather, Qianshu takes Xu Ren along for his routine treatment of the beggars under the overhead bridge. Qianshu does not charge any fee for the medical treatment. However, his hands keep shaking when he applies acupuncture due to his old age. Xu Ren observes Qianshu and recalls his experience treating the poor back in his era. 妍京的爷爷千述例行要去给天桥下的乞丐治病，他带着许任一起前去。千述给乞丐治病一律不收取任何费用，但是因他年纪大了，扎针的时候手不住发抖。许任在旁看着千述的所作所为，想起他在古代给穷人治病的经历。.

programme.desc: (R) The forest is the home of the Aboriginal people in the Malaysia Peninsula. Social urbanization is, however, eroding natural resources, threatening their livelihood and roots. (重)女艺人纷纷闪婚，究竟是什么原因呢？难道她们都是因为前男友恐婚造成的？嘉宾们对闪婚有什么独特见解？闪婚和长跑爱情哪个会长久？夫妻沈志豪和郑可为为什么长跑10年才结婚？来听听嘉宾们爆料，保证让你笑翻天！.

Xihao rushes to the airport to persuade him to stay. Hena rushes to the airport as well and speaks his mind to Junxia. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)崔俊夏歌手没有勇气向外公开承认抄袭赵成贤歌曲的真相，选择逃避要回澳大利亚。锡浩追到了机场想办法再说服留住他，而河那也追去机场，向俊夏说出心里话。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 28

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 8
programme.desc: After the events of the previous episode, Pepper survived the ordeal in the jungle and the near-death experience has given her a renewed perspective on life. She is ready to let go of Hulk, start her life afresh and take on new challenges. At the same time, the BMT is organizing their annual sports challenge and Bravo Company has openly challenged Sergeant Ong to send in their representatives. (PG)Pepper回到军营后，整个人变了，在训练的表现中也更加的积极和卖力。大家都看得出她的变化了。这时Bravo Company的Sergeant，Sergeant 浩练来到，挑衅Sergeant Ong，说我们之间一年一度的比赛就要开始了。原来Sergeant 浩练和Sergeant Ong每年都会排出代表，竞技好几个项目，如赛跑，SOC，搏击等等，看看巾帼是否胜须眉。Sergeant Ong接受浩练的挑战，但首轮比赛（赛跑）他们就输了。第二轮的比赛是SOC，浩练信心满满一定会赢。.

(重)《极境之旅》主持人葛凡再次启程，经历19个小时的飞行，终于抵达世界的最北端，开启他的极地冒险旅程。这个世界上最大的岛屿，全境百分之八十的面积都被冰雪覆盖，是一个冰做的天堂，它的名字叫做—格陵兰。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 8
programme.desc: After the events of the previous episode, Pepper survived the ordeal in the jungle and the near-death experience has given her a renewed perspective on life. She is ready to let go of Hulk, start her life afresh and take on new challenges. At the same time, the BMT is organizing their annual sports challenge and Bravo Company has openly challenged Sergeant Ong to send in their representatives. Pepper回到军营后，整个人变了，在训练的表现中也更加的积极和卖力。大家都看得出她的变化了。这时Bravo Company的Sergeant，Sergeant 浩练来到，挑衅Sergeant Ong，说我们之间一年一度的比赛就要开始了。原来Sergeant 浩练和Sergeant Ong每年都会排出代表，竞技好几个项目，如赛跑，SOC，搏击等等，看看巾帼是否胜须眉。Sergeant Ong接受浩练的挑战，但首轮比赛（赛跑）他们就输了。第二轮的比赛是SOC，浩练信心满满一定会赢。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 5
programme.desc: Angels who grant peace at death beds might sound fantastical; but in the Netherlands, there is a group of people who does exactly that. Every day, they travel all over the country in a special ambulance to the terminally ill, not to treat them, but to help complete their one final wish. 在面临死亡的时候，我们都希望能够了无牵挂，无怨无悔地离开。在尼德兰，有一组人一年365天开着一辆特殊救护车，到各地的医院接送临终病人。他们不是为了抢救病人，而是要帮助他们完成人生中的最后一个心愿。.

Yalan tries to defend her actions in front of the board of directors, but Juxi refuses to accept her explanation. Yalan decides to resign. Ep 11: 菊熙跟酒厂厂长通电话时才发现雅兰背着她指使工厂在传统酒内加入人工添加剂。公司高层召开紧急会议商讨雅兰的过失。雅兰企图辩解，菊熙却不加以理会。雅兰觉得自己努力多年仍得不到菊熙的疼惜，一气之下递辞呈。.

programme.desc: Only after Dehao decided to represent Daxiu's sister, Xiaozhen, in her illegal dismissal case, did he discover that she has been arrested for child abuse. He finds out later that Zhixu is in charge of the case. Dehao, Daxiu and Ailuo go undercover in the kindergarten to gather evidence that can prove Xiaozhen's innocence. 当德浩决定帮大修的妹妹晓真打非法解雇官司时，才发现她因打孩子、虐待儿童而被拘押。德浩去找检察官了解案件时，才知是志旭接手负责这案子。德浩为了证明晓真的清白，与大修和爱萝去幼儿园当卧底，收集更多证据。.

Her mother is unhappy but can only encourage her to look for a new job. 大修因妹妹晓真无故被幼儿园园长诬告虐待儿童的事感到难过，借酒消愁。恩祖终于鼓起勇气开口跟妈妈说她辞去了金山法律事务所的工作。她妈妈虽然十分生气，但也只能鼓励女儿再找新工作。.

programme.title: Dimensi Ke-4 - EP 1
programme.desc: While waiting for her divorce to be finalised, Suliah's decision to co-habitate with another man, Meor, incurred the wrath of the traditional village folks, resulting in the latter shunning her. Concurrently, the villagers were also surprised at how Suliah managed to sustain herself and Meor without having any visible means of employment. Meanwhile, money and other items have mysteriously disappeared from the villagers' houses, fuelling rumours that Suliah actually kept a 'toyol' to steal items from them for her own benefit. Interestingly, the village is also home to a group of drug addicts who would stop at nothing to get their next 'fix'.

programme.title: Dimensi Ke-4 - EP 9
programme.desc: After 25 years of searching, Pak Ali met his long-lost neighbour, Pak Raman at the Home for the Aged. The meeting brought back memories of his younger days where he stayed in the same kampong with Pak Raman, now known as Pak Salleh. He relates to Razak, the Home's administrator about what happened to his life, and why and how he plotted to take revenge on Pak Salleh. All his life, Ali believed that the flamboyant Raman had used black magic to run away with his wife. But in reality, Ali's wife actually ran away with his sister's fiance. Raman, not a local and known for his dubious character, became the main suspect when the villagers found a body with a burnt chin at the village cemetery. Not able to withstand the humiliation from Ali and his sister, Fatimah, Raman decided to take revenge. He met Tok Batin, a medicine man to get even with them. He used Minyak Dagu to seduce Fatimah. After impregnated Fatimah, Raman ran away from the village.

programme.title: Dimensi Ke-4 - EP 13
programme.desc: Asmah is dying. The villagers believed that she had been cursed. The doctor who treated her found needles inside her body. Asmah's children looked for Mariah for help. The latter was Asmah's good friend, who vehemently believed that Asmah's sickness was caused by the susuk. They have had lived the high life in the past. Asmah believed that her marriage failed because she was not pretty and attractive to keep her husband. She took 'susuk', believing that her life will change for the better. Asmah finally died. Mariah tried to convince the family members that Asmah's death had nothing to do with her wrongdoings.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi Sr 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: A spoilt child, Sazali grows up to be the most wanted robber in town. One day he plans to rob a bank and thus, he asks his accomplice, Jenal to get a map of the bank. Jenal manages to get the map but they could not read the map which is written in 'Jawi'. Coincidentally, a 'madrasah' boy, Atan visits them when they were struggling to read the map. An effort to sell charity coupons turn into a nightmare for Atan when he is forced to read what is written on the map. Only then, they discover that the map is actually the layout of an abundant graveyard. Sazali's another accomplice, Bohari finally gets the right map but Hassan, Sazali's dad has accidentally thrown it away. Sazali and his accomplices decide to rob without any map. Unfortunately, they end up with misfortune when the policemen arrest them.

programme.title: Fiesta Komedi Sr 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Azura and Zack are earning a modest living by selling Azura's Pau and Zack's Pancake at a coffee shop. Azura who has been kicked out of the house by her aunty and Zack who has forsaken his silver spoon life promised by his father, Dato' Putih, decide to make a life for each other. The loving and happy couple is always seen singing and dancing, relishing every moment they have together. Mak Tam and Pak Mat, the other two vendors who are selling noodles and chicken rice respectively begin to suspect that something is amiss with the new tenants. Azura and Zack will begin selling late in the day and will finish early. Coincidentally, the coffee shop receives customers, a wealthy businessman and a sultry wannabe singer who will eventually buy all of Azura and Zack's kuihs. Furthermore Mak Tam and Pak Mat's customers are dwindling, badly affecting their business. They decide to spring into action and get to the crux of their suspicion. A few days after, Zack is surprised to meet his father a.

Dino and Tina spring to action. They find Rizal unconscious by a tree. Dino and Tina call for a cab and send the couple to hospital. Rosita tearfully relates how Rizal brought her to the park that night, for a 'night picnic' by the stars. Rizal is just about to propose to her, when they see the Penanggal flying over them!

programme.title: Cantik Detektif - EP 2
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Gorgeous radiant skin, long silky hair and youthful looks make us envy everything about Thai women. But how is it that they are able to defy time even in their advancing years? Host Huda Ali investigates Thailand's novel beauty secrets that have been passed down from generation to generation. From a 16th century Thai tradition of Hermit Contortion that promises longevity to the 5000 year old 'Tok Sen' (hammer massage) that is said to have the same benefits of acupuncture but without the needles, Huda tries them all to find out the truth behind the claims.

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 1
programme.desc: Di Hujung Pelangi takes a look at the inspirational journeys of special families with special needs children who have learn to accept and embrace life's challenges by moving their lives forward in the most positive direction. In general, the three types of spina bifida (from mild to severe) are Spina Bifida Occulta, Meningocele and Myelomeningocele. The effects of myelomeningocele, the most serious form of spina bifida, may include muscle weakness or paralysis below the area of the spine where the incomplete closure (or cleft) occurs, loss of sensation below the cleft, and loss of bowel and bladder control. This episode highlights a family whose child suffers from spina bifida and has had a series of operations throughout her childhood. She suffers learning problems such as difficulty with paying attention, expressing or understanding language, and grasping reading and math. The interviews will highlight how early diagnosis and intervention has helped her to prepare and cope with sc.

programme.title: Helo Switzerland - EP 1

programme.desc: In a small town in the Philippines, Jacinto Managbanag runs a free maternity clinic for the poor women who can't afford the public maternity healthcare.Fadli and Jacinto travel to the most remote village to bring maternity services to the underprivileged segment of the society.

programme.title: Cities Of The World - EP 7
programme.desc: Cities of the world features large and small cities from around the world, revealing their icons, culture, tourist and hidden highlights with information about local custom, personality and history.

programme.title: Berita 2019-2020 - EP 321
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: The Samsons - EP 3
programme.desc: The Samsons is a fictional Malay family who lives in a typical HDB home in Singapore. The family comprises of the couple, Samson and DD Cun and their respective single parents. Samson's mother, Mak Ti, also happens to be the first ex-wife of DD Cun's father, Pak Jon. These elder duo can barely see eye to eye without erupting into an argument.We explore the unique world of cross-channel cross-culture artistes like Bobby Tonelli, Fuzz and Gloria Tan.

programme.title: Curi Curi Cinta - EP 24
programme.desc: A family drama about a disobedient daughter who is embarassed by her poor upbringing, her blind mother and handicapped brother and her actions to be away from them by tricking a rich man to marry her. However when tables are turn against her, she has to redeem herself to her family.

programme.title: Zoom New Zealand - EP 6
programme.desc: Backpacking around New Zealand, filled with epic scenery, unique cultural experiences and amazing outdoor activities everywhere will be an eye opener. Fadhlur and Syarif are to go behind the wheels on a road trip where they will drive from one point to the next destination and they make new friends along the way. Getting closer to nature will make this season different, where camping in the wild and hunting for food source will be a challenge for them in order to understand how the aborigines live.

programme.title: Detik 2019-2020 - EP 38
programme.desc: The half hour program analyses and dissect issues of concern to the Malay-Muslim Singaporeans - be it at the community level, national, regional or global. Apart from raising awareness, each DETIK episode hopes to set viewers thinking and make informed decisions on matters that can impact their lives.

programme.title: Insight - EP 37
programme.desc: A major humanitarian crisis is unfolding in India after more than 1.9 million people living in India's north-eastern state of Assam were left out of the National Register of Citizens (NRC). The results of the NRC, seen in conjunction with a contentious citizenship law, can leave a large number of people, predominantly Muslims, potentially stateless. Indian Home Minister, Amit Shah, has described illegal immigrants as "infiltrators" and "termites" who are sucking the nation's resources dry.
